meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring within a particular zone.
meanings.sent1: The intrazonal plants thrive in this specific area.
meanings.sent2: The intrazonal climate of the rainforest is unique.
meanings.sent3: The intrazonal animals had a party in their zone.
meanings.sent4: The intrazonal boundaries are like invisible walls.
meanings.sent5: The intrazonal characteristics of the soil make it ideal for certain plants.

meanings.definition: Existing or situated within a specific ecological zone.
meanings.sent1: The intrazonal species are well adapted to their habitat.
meanings.sent2: The intrazonal vegetation changes as you move through different zones.
meanings.sent3: The intrazonal insects threw a tiny parade in their zone.
meanings.sent4: The intrazonal roots of the tree spread deep into the soil.
meanings.sent5: The intrazonal relationship between predator and prey is fascinating to observe.
